snippet: A group of legislators and proponents of reform held a closed-door meeting with Secretary of Education Arne Duncan last Tuesday in Washington to push the idea of a panel.
abstract: Group of legislators and proponents of reform call on Congress to consider a presidential commission for college sports as NCAA issues pile up.
lead_paragraph: A group of legislators and proponents of reform held a closed-door meeting with Secretary of Education Arne Duncan last Tuesday in Washington to push the idea of a panel.

headline.main: As N.C.A.A. Issues Pile Up, a Call for a Commission
headline.print_headline: A Call for a Commission as N.C.A.A. Issues Pile Up
